summary: Page 84 (left side), chapter 5. Continuation from section 114, then sections 115-120. Section 120 cut off at bottom. All sections and structure correctly captured.

issues.description: OCR has 'לכן היה ירא מפרהס [?]' with a question mark uncertainty marker. The word 'מפרהס' is likely wrong - the image seems to show 'מפרעה' (from Pharaoh), fitting the context about the Avot having the status of Bnei Noach.
OCR has 'ופקוח נפשות לזכות ולמוד זכות' but image appears to have 'וכו'' between 'נפשות' and 'לזכות'.
